name: Scarab Space Sim
description:
Made in unreal engine

By xorm (Curtis Agnew) not a developer and developed this game

KangaGamer (Joshua Watts) artist and knows the guy that made the music

and mbcool (Matt) The web guy, also arts

See if you can navigate the debri and "discover" the inner working of the ship

(get to the red light inside as fast as possible without crashing)

Game is unfinished but decided to upload anyways. Click in thumbsticks or space bar to restart the map if you loose control

Anolog sticks/touch pad for movement
